content.title: Merit·cum·Means Scholarships For Under Graduate Studies In Various Branches Of Agriculture And Animal Science Subjects
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.beneficiary: Students pursuing undergraduate studies in Agriculture and Animal Science
content.details: The scheme of 'Merit·cum·Means Scholarships For Under Graduate Studies In Various Branches Of Agriculture And Animal Science Subjects' is a scholarship scheme introduced by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR), Department of Agricultural Research and Education (DARE), with a view to attracting meritorious under-graduate students to prosecute their study in Agriculture, Agricultural Engineering, Home Science, Dairy & Animal Husbandry subjects up to graduation level. The scholarships are awarded annually on the basis of merit-cum-means.
benefits: ₹ 1,000/- per month per student for the full duration of the degree course
eligibility: Students must satisfy the 'Means Test' condition
Must have secured not less than 60% marks or equivalent grade points in the qualifying examination
The scholarship is admissible to Indian Nationals or persons domiciled in India
exclusions: Students whose parents have an income exceeding ₹ 1,00,000 per annum are not eligible for scholarships
documents_required: Income Certificate issued by the designated State/UT Authority
Details of the Bank Account in the name of the student or Joint Account with Mother/Father
Proof of admission into an ICAR recognized Agricultural University

faqs.question: What would happen in case the student is unable to Take Examination Due to Illness?
faqs.answer: The scholarship may be renewed for the next year on the recommendation of the Head of the Institution if the student is unable to appear for the annual examination due to illness.

faqs.question: Is the Scholarship Admissible For Absence On Grounds Of Maternity?
faqs.answer: For married women, the scholarship will be admissible at the full rate for up to three months for absence on grounds of maternity.

faqs.question: What will be the Value Of The Scholarships For Undergraduate Studies?
faqs.answer: The value of the scholarships for undergraduate studies in Agriculture and Animal Science subjects will be ₹ 1,000/- per month per student.

faqs.question: Are foreign nationals also eligible to apply to this scheme?
faqs.answer: The Scholarship will ordinarily be admissible to the person of Indian Nationality as defined in the constitution of India.
